title: Ticket #2093: add definitions of undocumented negotiator classad attributes
description:
Many new statistical attributes about the negotiation cycle (LastNegotiationCycleXXXXXX) were added to the Negotiator Ad as part of #1705 and #1303, but only 7 out of 20 ended up being documented in the Negotiator Classad Attributes section of Appendix A in the Manual. Of the 7 that were documented, there are errors: for instance, in the v7.6.0 Manual, LastNegotiationCycleDuration<X> is documented twice on the same page with conflicting definitions.

The definitive list of attributes that must be documented appears to be:

  1. LastNegotiationCycleActiveSubmitterCount
  2. LastNegotiationCycleCandidateSlots
  3. LastNegotiationCycleDuration
  4. LastNegotiationCycleEnd
  5. LastNegotiationCycleMatches
  6. LastNegotiationCycleMatchRate
  7. LastNegotiationCycleMatchRateSustained
  8. LastNegotiationCycleNumIdleJobs
  9. LastNegotiationCycleNumJobsConsidered
  10. LastNegotiationCycleNumSchedulers
  11. LastNegotiationCyclePeriod
  12. LastNegotiationCyclePhase<X>Duration
  13. LastNegotiationCycleRejections
  14. LastNegotiationCycleSlotShareIter
  15. LastNegotiationCycleSubmittersFailed
  16. LastNegotiationCycleSubmittersOutOfTime
  17. LastNegotiationCycleSubmittersShareLimit
  18. LastNegotiationCycleTime
  19. LastNegotiationCycleTotalSlots
  20. LastNegotiationCycleTrimmedSlots
remarks:
2011-Apr-26 13:50:57 by tannenba:
Erik, as you wrote the code, could you please either update the Manual, or add a remark in this ticket w/ the info and ask Karen to insert it into the manual? Thanks!

2011-Apr-26 14:19:09 by eje:
I had attached a doc patch to an abandoned version of the ticket (#1705) -- I attached a copy here as well.

2011-Apr-26 14:27:33 by tannenba:
Perfect, thanks Erik! Re-assigning this ticket to Karen for merging into the Manual.

2011-Jun-28 12:56:34 by smoler:
The diff provide in the doc patch does not contain (from Todd's list) definitions for

14. LastNegotiationCycleSlotShareIter

17. LastNegotiationCycleSubmittersShareLimit

18. LastNegotiationCycleTime

And, the current 7.6.1 appendix section contains a definition of LastNegotiationCycleStartTime<X>, which does NOT appear in Todd's list. I've commented this one out of the manual unless I hear that it was incorrectly missing from Todd's list.

Please provide definitions (and correct attribute names) for these 3 as remarks (not a diff, since the LaTeX version that I have will not work with a doc patch), or let me know that these 3 are not actually attributes.

2011-Jul-14 10:54:32 by smoler:
The definition given in the additional patch for LastNegotiationCycleSlotShareIter<X> is unusable. Please define what your invented term "Allocation Round" refers to. When writing quality documentation, it is generally best to keep the number of invented terms to the minimum possible. Further, if you must introduce a new term, then you have to define your term! Otherwise, those trying to use the documentation don't know what you are talking about.

Give your definition in a remark to this ticket. Do not give an additional patch, as it cannot be used!

Hopefully, final question: was the existing documentation of the nonexistent attribute LastNegotiationCycleStartTime<X> simply an incorrect attribute name? Seems like the definition is the same as for LastNegotiationCycleTime<X>. If yes, you blew it in your naming, as the 'CycleStartTime' implies the definition of a start time, while 'CycleTime' does not.

2011-Jul-14 11:11:50 by eje:
An Allocation Round is a sequence of quota allocation, followed by negotitation. In pre-HGQ negotiation, this only happened once. Now, it may be allowed to happen multiple times. An accounting group may not be able to use is allotted quota, in which case that quota may be re-assigned to other accounting groups in a subsequent Allocation Round.

see also: http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.6/3_3Configuration.html#19800

2011-Jul-14 11:18:28 by eje:
Regarding the non-existent attribute LastNegotiationCycleStartTime<X>, I assume that I introduced it as an accidental (and also mis-typed) copy of the actual attribute LastNegotiationCycleTime<X>.

The attribute LastNegotiationCycleTime<X> was introduced by somebody else, at some earlier time. It isn't one of the ones I created.

2011-Jul-14 11:40:09 by smoler:
Documentation of remaining attributes went into V7_6_2-branch. Fixed version field remains 7.6.1, as most of the info went out with the 7.6.1 release.
attachments:
• new_neg_stats_doc_uw.patch 6690 bytes added by eje on 2011-Apr-26 19:17:18 UTC.
    Doc patch, moved from #1705
  • gt2093_additional_attr_doc.patch 3303 bytes added by eje on 2011-Jul-12 18:54:47 UTC.
    Fills in descriptions for: LastNegotiationCycleSlotShareIter<X> LastNegotiationCycleSubmittersShareLimit<X> LastNegotiationCycleTime<X>

    Also removes spurious LastNegotiationCycleStartTime<X>
check_ins:

2011-Jun-29 10:07   Check-in [26053]: added most (but not all) missing LastNegotiationCycle* negotiator ClassAd attribute definitions; gittrac #2093 (By Karen Miller )
creator: tannenba
